title: Engineering Planning and Design Consultants | Kimley-Horn
text: About Us: Why Kimley-Horn? At Kimley-Horn, we lead with a people-first mindset. Whether you’re a client or an employee, you’ll feel the difference in how we work—because your success is our priority. At Kimley-Horn, we lead with a people-first mindset. Whether you’re a client or an employee, you’ll feel the difference in how we work—because your success is our priority. Come see why we’re regularly named as one of the best places to work by Fortune. We’re honored to be named on the Best Workplaces for Women™ 2025 list by Fortune and Great Place to Work® for our commitment to fostering a supportive and empowering environment for women. Kimley-Horn experts discuss open face tunneling methods, tunnel supports, and key projects in Texas and Nevada in a webinar hosted by the North American Society for Trenchless Technology.
